CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 15 As shown in Figure 1 , the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blending film ( 1 : 3 by weight ) has a strong absorption over a broad wavelength range of 400^-700 nm.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT / PC71BM blending film |

The material name in the paragraph is "PSFDTBT / PC71BM blending film". It is a blending film made of PSFDTBT and PC71BM, mixed in a weight ratio of 1:3.
